Subject: Update site certificates NEA
Description:
before March 12th 2025
NTM, NTP, NEA, AIC
What_We_Know__c:
------------
12.03.2025 

We successfully updated NEA Web Console certificates using steps from this article:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Reports/Secure.htm

New certificate was imported to LocalMachineMy store on NEA server and we updated certificate binding for port 443 on NEA server. 

Vinay will test NEA Web Console for a few days then reply back.
Next_Steps__c: Customer will reply back once they test out NEA Web Console after certificates were updated.
